page.title: 11EVENTS AT TATTON
page.content: { THE PARK IS AN IDEAL SETTING FOR MANY {EVENTS,}SOME ANNUAL, SUCH AS THE 2 DAY CHESHIRE SHOW AND CARRIAGE DRIVING. THIS YEAR THERE HAS BEEN A VINTAGE ENGINE RALLY,FUN RUN FOR CHARITY AND A CYCLING EVENT. { SHOWS}FOR ORCHIDS AND KOI CARP WERE HELD AND OTHER MORE COMMERCIAL SHOWS SUCH AS ANTIQUES AND CRAFT FAIRS. THE OLD HALL HAS BEEN THE VENUE FOR MORE{TRADITIONAL EVENTS;}JACOBEAN AND MEDIEVAL WEEKENDS,CRAFT DEMONSTRATIONS AND PLAYERS GROUPS FOR HALLOWEEN ETC. {THE MANSION}HOSTS MUSICAL PERFORMANCES A CIVIC BALL AND A CHRISTMAS FESTIVAL. THIS YEAR TO COINCIDE WITH VE AND VJ DAYS A {WARTIME AT TATTON}EVENT HAS BEEN HELD, WITH AN EXHIBITION IN THE CELLARS,PARACHUTE DROPS, A MILITARY VEHICLE DISPLAY AND A PARA TRAIL SHOWING THE WARTIME DROPPING ZONE FOR PARATROOP TRAINING.
